definitions.definition: To change one's shape or form (into another) through often magical means, normally applied only to living beings.
To undergo a noticeable change (in character for example), to metamorphosize .

main_definition: ( biology , fantasy , mythology , intransitive ) To change one's shape or form (into another) through often magical means, normally applied only to living beings.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , intransitive ) To undergo a noticeable change (in character for example), to metamorphosize .
